input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: AmazonEC2RESTActorAdapter
version The Amazon EC2 version. The current supported version is v1.0
access key [Optional] The AWS access key.
secret key [Optional] The AWS secret access key.

session token [Optional] : The AWS session token which is generally created for temporary access to users for role based authorization.
Please Note: The temporary access key , secret key and session token to be generated by the user to provide in adapter request.
Please refer below AWS docs for more details
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_temp_request.html
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/sts/assume-role.html
region [Optional] The region to communicate with.

item type The item type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values:
run-instances start-instances stop-instances reboot-instances reset-instance-attribute monitor-instances unmonitor-instances get-console-output get-password-data authorize-security-group-ingress revoke-security-group-ingress deregister-image register-image reset-image-attribute attach-volume detach-volume reset-snapshot-attribute bundle-instance cancel-bundle-task allocate-address associate-address disassociate-address release-address

items The items XML used to perform an operation within Amazon EC2
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>

output.description: The adapter response containing the results.

documentation.description: Perform Operations Perform action on one or more items within Amazon EC2.
